name: Welcome to Kowloon
description:
Welcome to Kowloon - is a first-person indie horror game in the walking simulator genre.
The average time to complete the game is 50 minutes.

Kowloon

Under the misty skies of China lay Kowloon, the most densely populated city, a tangle of narrow streets and endless passageways. Here, time lost its meaning, and the buildings merged into one indistinguishable sea of iron, concrete, and glass. Every step in this city led to a new discovery, a new story hidden within its walls. Hidden in the heart of Kowloon are places that defy description. Mysterious backstreets and cramped alleyways where the locals lived their hidden lives.

ㅤ

Description

Poverty and gang violence flourish in the heart of the neighborhood. However, for a young student, the first and most urgent desire is to find cheap housing.

When he crossed the threshold of his new home, he instantly felt himself drawn into a different reality. The inhabitants of this marvelous place seemed to keep their secrets from the gaze of outsiders. There was mystery in every look, mystery in every whisper, as if they were guarding something important, hidden from view.

Gameplay

You will have to visit a frightening place inhabited by creepy personalities.
Beautiful graphics and high quality 3D sound will help you to fully experience the atmosphere of the game.

ㅤ


Attention!
The game contains flashes of light that can cause epileptic seizures.
